repository.corpname: University of Utah Libraries, Special Collections

did.unittitle: University of Utah basketball films collection

physdesc.extent: Approximately 1,300 16mm film reels and VHS videocassettes.

did.abstract: A collection of films of University of Utah basketball games.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The University of Utah Utes basketball team was founded in 1908. The team has finished its season among the National Collegiate Athelitcs Association's (NCAA) top-25 teams 19 times 1949-2009 and has played in the following conferences:

scopecontent.p: A collection of films of University of Utah basketball games and highlight reels. Footage dates are sporadic and range from 1944-1984.

arrangement.p: Most of the collection is arranged chronologially by format and by content (complete game or highlight reel).

accessrestrict.p: Materials must be used on-site; no use of original material, access copies will be made available for viewing. Five business days advanced notice required. Access to parts of this collection may be restricted under provisions of state or federal law, condition of the material, or by donor.
